We organized a tutorial together with [CPS Virtual Organization](https://cps-vo.org/) on "Going Public with Your CPS Code and Data" at CPS-IoT Week 2025.

**Key Topics**
- Making code and data publicly available
- Best practices for open science
- Community engagement and feedback

This tutorial equipped researchers with practical tools and knowledge to share their work effectively with the broader research community. All materials are available [here](https://cps-vo.org/group/2025CPSTutorial).
